text:
Underfunded and underappreciated at a university so focused on ancient ruins and relics, [[Morgrave University]]'s Valdain Museum is nevertheless a fascinating collection of carefully stuffed and mounted creatures from across [[Khorvaire]] and beyond. The exhibits go far beyond mundane [[beast]]s to include a wide variety of [[monstrosities|monstrosity]], from [[blink dog]]s and [[displacer beast]]s to a great [[bulette]], and an enormous [[dragon]] skeleton hangs from the ceiling above the museum entrance. The Valdain Museum is located near the top of [[Karrnath]] Spire.

The museum's curator is Professor [[Sendor Reddick]].
title: Valdain Museum of Natural History
